widget.convert: { # Template for use when "description" is used # # For integrated extended help uncomment the "MultiContentEntryText" entries, # set the itemHeight for the extended entries to 50 and remove the panel for # "ScreenTemplateDescription4". "templates": { # Simple help with no headings ("flat") # data[1:] = [helpText] "default": (25, # itemHeight [ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(20, 0), size=(790, 25), font=1, flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=1) ]), # Simple help with headings # data[1:] = [heading, None] # For heading entries # data[1:] = [None, helpText] # For help entries "default+headings": (25, # itemHeight [ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(0, 0), size=(810, 25), font=0, flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=1), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(20, 0), size=(790, 25), font=1, flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=2) ]), # Extended help with no headings # data[1:] = [helpText, extendedHelpText] "extended": (25, # itemHeight [ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(20, 0), size=(790, 25), font=1, flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=1) # MultiContentEntryText(pos=(50, 25), size=(760, 25), font=1, flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=2) ]), # Extended help with headings # data[1:] = [heading, None, None] # For heading entries # data[1:] = [None, helpText, extendedHelpText] # For help entries "extended+headings": (25, # itemHeight [ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(0, 0), size=(810, 25), font=0, flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=1), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(20, 0), size=(790, 25), font=1, flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=2) # MultiContentEntryText(pos=(50, 25), size=(760, 25), font=2, flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=3) ]), }, "fonts": [parseFont("HelpFont;20"), parseFont("HelpFont;20"), parseFont("HelpFont;20")], "itemHeight": 25 }

{ "template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(20, 0), size=(400, 25), font=0, flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=2, color="Text", color_sel="TextSelected"), # Timer name. MultiContentEntryText(pos=(440, 0), size=(360, 25), font=0, flags=RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=3, color="InfoChannel", color_sel="InfoChannelSelected"), # Service name. MultiContentEntryText(pos=(20, 25), size=(400, 25), font=1, flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=0, color="InfoProgramNow", color_sel="InfoProgramSelected"), # Event name. MultiContentEntryText(pos=(440, 25), size=(360, 25), font=1, flags=RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=4, color="InfoTimesNow", color_sel="InfoTimesSelected") # Event time. ], "fonts": [parseFont("Regular;20"), parseFont("Regular;18")], "itemHeight": 50 }

{ "template": [ # MultiContentEntryText(pos=(20, 0), size=(280, 35), font=0, flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=1), # MultiContentEntryText(pos=(320, 0), size=(200, 35), font=0, flags=RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=2) # 0=SortKey, 1=Label, 2=Flag, 3=Directory, 4=Skin, 5=Resolution, 6=Preview, 7=Label + Flag MultiContentEntryText(pos=(20, 0), size=(250, 35), font=0, flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=1), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(280, 0), size=(180, 35), font=0, flags=RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=2), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(470, 0), size=(50, 35), font=0, flags=RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=5) # MultiContentEntryText(pos=(20, 0), size=(440, 35), font=0, flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=7) ], "fonts": [parseFont("MenuFont;25")], "itemHeight": 35 }

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message...
screen.applet:
def getScreenObjectSize(data, screenObject, maxWidth, maxHeight): from enigma import eLabel, eSize if isinstance(data, str): data = [(data, None)] font = screenObject.instance.getFont() size = eSize(maxWidth, maxHeight) width = max([eLabel.calculateTextSize(font, line[0], size, False).width() for line in data]) if data else 0 # width += data[0][1][1] # Text indent to allow for leading icon space. height = max([eLabel.calculateTextSize(font, line[0], size, False).height() for line in data]) if data else 0 return (width, height)
try: from enigma import ePoint, eSize, getDesktop screenSize = (getDesktop(0).size().width(), getDesktop(0).size().height()) if hasattr(self, "icon"): iconPos = (icon.instance.position().x(), icon.instance.position().y()) iconSize = (icon.instance.size().width(), icon.instance.size().height()) else: iconPos = (0, 0) iconSize = (0, 0) typeIcon = self.typeIcon if hasattr(self, "typeIcon") else self.type if self.list: listPos = (self["list"].instance.position().x(), self["list"].instance.position().y()) listSize = (self["list"].instance.size().width(), self["list"].instance.size().height()) scrollbarWidth = self["list"].instance.getScrollbarOffset() + self["list"].instance.getScrollbarWidth() scrollbarMode = self["list"].instance.getScrollbarMode() itemHeight = self["list"].l.getItemSize().height() skinLines = listSize[1] // itemHeight listLines = len(self.list) newListWidth, newListHeight = getScreenObjectSize(self.list, self["list"], screenSize[0], screenSize[1]) newListWidth = max(listSize[0], min(screenSize[0] - 100, newListWidth + (scrollbarWidth if listLines > skinLines or scrollbarMode == 1 else 0))) newListSize = (newListWidth, itemHeight * (skinLines if listLines > skinLines else listLines)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(newListSize[0], newListSize[1])) textAdjust = max(0, newListSize[0] - listSize[0]) else: textAdjust = 0 textPos = (self["text"].instance.position().x(), self["text"].instance.position().y()) textSize = (self["text"].instance.size().width(), self["text"].instance.size().height()) maxWidth = textSize[0] + textAdjust + (0 if typeIcon else textPos[0] - iconPos[0]) newTextWidth, newTextHeight = getScreenObjectSize(self["text"].getText(), self["text"], maxWidth, screenSize[1]) if newTextHeight > screenSize[1] - 100: maxWidth += 300 newTextWidth, newTextHeight = getScreenObjectSize(self["text"].getText(), self["text"], maxWidth, screenSize[1]) newTextSize = (max(textSize[0], maxWidth), max(textSize[1], newTextHeight)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(newTextSize[0], newTextSize[1])) if typeIcon == 0: self["text"].instance.move(ePoint(iconPos[0], textPos[1])) if self.list: spacer = listPos[1] - textPos[1] - textSize[1] self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(listPos[0], textPos[1] + newTextSize[1] + spacer)) width = newListSize[0] height = newTextSize[1] + newListSize[1] + spacer elif typeIcon: width = textPos[0] - iconPos[0] + newTextSize[0] height = newTextSize[1] else: width = newTextSize[0] height = newTextSize[1] self.instance.resize(eSize(width, height)) self.instance.move(ePoint((screenSize[0] - width) // 2, (screenSize[1] - height) // 2)) except Exception as err: print(f"[MessageBoxSkin] DEBUG: The skin applet 'onLayoutFinish' crashed! ({err})")

screen.name: ChoiceBox
screen.title: Choose...
screen.applet:
def getScreenObjectSize(data, font, maxWidth, maxHeight): # 625,525 235,140 from enigma import eLabel, eSize if isinstance(data, str): data = [((data, None), (0, 0, 0))] size = eSize(maxWidth, maxHeight) width = max([eLabel.calculateTextSize(font, line[0][0], size, False).width() for line in data if line[0]]) if data else 0 height = max([eLabel.calculateTextSize(font, line[0][0], size, False).height() for line in data if line[0]]) if data else 0 return (width, height)
try: from enigma import ePoint, eSize, getDesktop from skin import parseFont textWidget = self["text"] listWidget = self["list"] textFont = parseFont("DescriptionFont;25") listFont = parseFont("ChoiceList;25") # screenSize = (getDesktop(0).size().width(), getDesktop(0).size().height()) # windowPos = (self.instance.position().x(), self.instance.position().y()) # Not actually required other than debug logging! windowSize = (self.instance.csize().width(), self.instance.csize().height()) textPos = (textWidget.instance.position().x(), textWidget.instance.position().y()) textSize = (textWidget.instance.size().width(), textWidget.instance.size().height()) textMargin = (textPos[0], windowSize[0] - textSize[0] - textPos[0]) listPos = (listWidget.instance.position().x(), listWidget.instance.position().y()) listSize = (listWidget.instance.size().width(), listWidget.instance.size().height()) listMargin = (listPos[0], windowSize[0] - listSize[0] - listPos[0]) textFirst = textPos[1] < listPos[1] # print(f"[ChoiceBoxSkin] Window DEBUG: Position=({windowPos[0]},{windowPos[1]}), Size=({windowSize[0]},{windowSize[1]}).") # print(f"[ChoiceBoxSkin] Text DEBUG: Position=({textPos[0]},{textPos[1]}), Size=({textSize[0]},{textSize[1]}), Margin=({textMargin[0]},{textMargin[1]}).") # print(f"[ChoiceBoxSkin] List DEBUG: Position=({listPos[0]},{listPos[1]}), Size=({listSize[0]},{listSize[1]}), Margin=({listMargin[0]},{listMargin[1]}).") if textFirst: spacerTop = textPos[1] spacerMiddle = listPos[1] - textPos[1] - textSize[1] spacerBottom = windowSize[1] - listPos[1] - listSize[1] else: spacerTop = listPos[1] spacerMiddle = textPos[1] - listPos[1] - listSize[1] spacerBottom = windowSize[1] - textPos[1] - textSize[1] # print(f"[ChoiceBoxSkin] Spacer DEBUG: Top={spacerTop}, Middle={spacerMiddle}, Bottom={spacerBottom}.") scrollbarWidth = listWidget.instance.getScrollbarOffset() + listWidget.instance.getScrollbarWidth() scrollbarMode = listWidget.instance.getScrollbarMode() itemHeight = listWidget.l.getItemSize().height() skinLines = listSize[1] // itemHeight listData = listWidget.getList() listLines = len(listData) listWidth, listHeight = getScreenObjectSize(listData, listFont, screenSize[0] - 100, itemHeight) listWidth = max(listSize[0], min(screenSize[0] - 100, listWidth + (scrollbarWidth if listLines > skinLines or scrollbarMode == 1 else 0))) listHeight = itemHeight * (skinLines if listLines > skinLines else listLines) # print(f"[ChoiceBoxSkin] Lines DEBUG: itemHeight={itemHeight}, skinLines={skinLines}, listLines={listLines}, scrollbarWidth={scrollbarWidth}, scrollbarMode={scrollbarMode}, listWidth={listWidth}, listHeight={listHeight}.") textData = textWidget.getText() if textData: textWidth, textHeight = getScreenObjectSize(textData, textFont, listWidth, windowSize[1]) if textFirst: textTop = spacerTop listTop = spacerTop + textHeight + spacerMiddle else: listTop = spacerTop textTop = spacerTop + listHeight + spacerMiddle else: textWidth, textHeight = (0, 0) spacerMiddle = 0 textTop = 0 listTop = spacerTop # print(f"[ChoiceBoxSkin] NewText DEBUG: Position=({textPos[0]},{textTop}), Size=({textWidth},{textHeight})") textWidget.instance.resize(eSize(textWidth, textHeight)) textWidget.instance.move(ePoint(textPos[0], textTop)) # print(f"[ChoiceBoxSkin] NewList DEBUG: Position=({listPos[0]},{listTop}), Size=({listWidth},{listHeight})") listWidget.instance.resize(eSize(listWidth, listHeight)) listWidget.instance.move(ePoint(listMargin[0], listTop)) width = listMargin[0] + listWidth + listMargin[1] height = spacerTop + textHeight + spacerMiddle + listHeight + spacerBottom self.instance.resize(eSize(width, height)) self.instance.move(ePoint((screenSize[0] - width) // 2, (screenSize[1] - height) // 2)) except Exception as err: print(f"[ChoiceBoxSkin] DEBUG: The skin applet 'onLayoutFinish' crashed! ({err})")

screen.name: TextBox
screen.title: Message...
screen.applet:
def getScreenObjectSize(screenObject, maxWidth, maxHeight): from enigma import eLabel, eSize data = screenObject.getText() font = screenObject.instance.getFont() size = eSize(maxWidth, maxHeight) width = eLabel.calculateTextSize(font, data, size, False).width() height = eLabel.calculateTextSize(font, data, size, False).height() return (width, height)
try: from enigma import ePoint, eSize, getDesktop textWidget = self["text"] screenSize = (getDesktop(0).size().width(), getDesktop(0).size().height()) windowSize = (self.instance.csize().width(), self.instance.csize().height()) textPos = (textWidget.instance.position().x(), textWidget.instance.position().y()) textSize = (textWidget.instance.size().width(), textWidget.instance.size().height()) textMargin = (textPos[0], windowSize[0] - textSize[0] - textPos[0]) spacerTop = textPos[1] spacerBottom = windowSize[1] - textPos[1] - textSize[1] textWidth, textHeight = getScreenObjectSize(textWidget, textSize[0], textSize[1]) if textSize[1] > textHeight: textWidget.instance.resize(eSize(textWidth, textHeight)) width = textMargin[0] + textWidth + textMargin[1] height = spacerTop + textHeight + spacerBottom self.instance.resize(eSize(width, height)) self.instance.move(ePoint((screenSize[0] - width) // 2, (screenSize[1] - height) // 2)) except Exception as err: print(f"[TextBoxSkin] DEBUG: The skin applet 'onLayoutFinish' crashed! ({err})")
